summary: On a farm in the West of France, Catherine a plump little girl, dreams of escaping her joyless life. Her parents do not seem to know what a heart is and her father can get violent ... See full summary »
cast: Marina Foïs|Guillaume Canet|Océane Decaudain|Anne Benoît|Marc Brunet|Sissi Duparc|Hervé Lassïnce|Eloïse Charretier|Daniel Milgram|Etienne Allemand|Samuel Allemand|Christel Baras|Kate Blanchard|Olivier Blin|Raphaël Bouvet|Denis Braccini|Sandie Cabrol|Alexandre Callec|Rémy Carpentier|Clément Champion|Jérémie Chaplain|Hugo Clevin|Anne Coesens|Vincent Darre|Grégory Gatignol|Guillaume Gouix|Arnaud Henriet|Julien Herbau|Elisa Heusch|Denis Jansolin|Antoine Laurent|Tennessee Maquignon|Alexandra Michel|Jacques Navet|Hugo Petit|Marie-Hélène Peyresaubes|Julien Piguet|Jonathan Reyes|Patrick Ronchin|Rémy Roubakha|Christian Ruché|Ange Ruzé|Jean Teulé|Jean-Marc Valenti
title: Darling
